live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.

Services for most customers have been restored.  However, some customers do remain offline, and technicians will continue working to restore service as power is restored.  We will have an update in the morning.
Additional areas have had services restored and technicians continue to work to bring all services online as power gets restored. .
Several areas have had services restored. Technicians continue to bring remaining areas back online.
Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.
Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area.
Services are disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Shaw's technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area.
36481.summary: Some customers in the BC Kootenay & Interior Regions are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36481.title: Apr 18 - BC Kootenay & Interior Regions | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Fix In Progress)

36523.summary: Please be advised Rogers and Fido wireless customers are experiencing an intermittent service interruption for wireless phone calls, text and data services. They are working to resolve this as soon as possible however there is no estimated time of resolution available.
36523.title: Apr 19 – National | Rogers Network (Resolved)

36523.title: Apr 19 – National | Rogers Network (Resolved)

live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our technicians will continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly as possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take several hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Power is still being restored by BC Hydro. As areas and our equipment get power back, our technicians will be working to fully restore our services in the area. Thank you for your continued patience.
BC Hydro does not have an ETA on repairs at the moment, and expect work to take most of the day. Once power has been restored, our crews will be on site to restore services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
